Welcome to Mini Calendar

Be part of the Mini Calendar Community

Join us on Discord.

Supporting the development

If you want to support the development, consider taking a look at the membership options on Patreon.

If you prefer, you can support via Ko-fi.

Documentation

Feeling a little lost? Head over to our documentation page for some direction, or jump on Discord and ask a question.

settings.calSheetDimensionsHint: Stores the last position and size of the calendar.
settings.calHudOpenedHint: Stores if the calendar HUD was open when you last closed Foundry.
settings.calSheetOpenedHint: Stores if the calendar was open when you last closed Foundry.
settings.resumeAfterCombatHint: Restores the clock after combat has finished.
settings.fadedUIHint: Calnedar will fade until mouse is hovered over
settings.hideHudonCombatHint: Hides the HUD during combat and reopens at end.
